The Estonian Foreign Minister Margus Tashkn reacted to Russia's night attack against Ukrainian infrastructure and strongly condemned combined blows using drones and missiles in the cities of Ukraine.

"This is part of the reality that Putin is turning the recent so-called votes of confidence," Margus Tsahkna added.
